name: Cardiff's Most Wanted
description:
You are an ordinary person enjoying the quiet life in Cardiff. 
Cardiff, New South Wales. Population: peaceful! 
It's another ordinary day walking home from the shops when you run into - literally - four absolute weirdos who want your help catching an alien. 
Are you cut out for the job, or will you crumble under the pressure and extreme absurdity of team Firewood? 

FEATURING: 

- super cool, painstakingly drawn sprites 
- characters that sure do have personalities!
- an alien! maybe even two! or three?! 
- like, at least five endings! 
- dialogue written under severe sleep deprivation! 
- ....and more!
